description: 1996, Microsoft released its first competitive browser, which was complete with its own features and tags. It was also the first browser to support style sheets, which at the time was seen as an obscure authoring technique.

1989, whilst working at </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CERN" title="CERN" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CERN" data-cms-link-type="external">CERN</a><span> </span><a Berners-Lee</a><span> proposed to create a global hypertext project, which later became known as the </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web" title="World Wide Web" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web" data-cms-link-type="external">World Wide Web</a><span>. During 1991 to 1993 the World Wide Web was born. Text-only pages could be viewed using a simple line-mode browser.</span><span> In 1993 </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Andreessen" title="Marc Andreessen" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Andreessen" data-cms-link-type="external">Marc Andreessen</a><span> and </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Bina" title="Eric Bina" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Bina" data-cms-link-type="external">Eric Bina</a><span>, created the </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mosaic_browser" title="Mosaic browser" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mosaic_browser" data-cms-link-type="external">Mosaic browser</a><span>. At the time there were multiple browsers, however the majority of them were Unix-based and naturally text heavy. There had been no integrated approach to graphic design elements such as images or sounds. The Mosaic browser broke this mould. </span><span>The </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W3C" title="W3C" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W3C" data-cms-link-type="external">W3C</a><span> was created in October 1994 to "lead the World Wide Web to its full potential by developing common protocols that promote its evolution and ensure its interoperability."</span><span> This discouraged any one company from monopolizing a propriety browser and programming language, which could have altered the effect of the World Wide Web as a whole. The W3C continues to set standards, which can today be seen with JavaScript.</span></p>"},"expanded":true,"description":"","ghostContainer":false,"visibleFormGroups":["9b68effe-95e3-4c14-9582-82b370ee7f74"],"templateUnitId":"MUNIT-15d022ab-3554-4505-9303-a992030779d2-MUNIT","id":"MUNIT-9008329f-d8db-4cf5-b5c9-fec6dc410270-MUNIT","inserted":true,"insideGhost":false,"children":[{"moduleId":"rz_style_font","name":"","formValues":{"cssEnableLetterSpacing":{"type":"bp","default":false},"cssEnableLineHeight":{"type":"bp","default":true},"cssLineHeight":{"type":"bp","default":"175%"},"cssEnableFontSize":{"type":"bp","[object Object]":true,"default":false},"cssFontSize":{"type":"bp","default":"16px"}},"expanded":true,"templateUnitId":"MUNIT-b93ceb36-3985-45a4-a1fb-1b2bb03cabbf-MUNIT","id":"MUNIT-5d084216-af8e-4bb0-8c88-2a93a7c93528-MUNIT"},{"moduleId":"rz_selector_elements","name":"{"de":"Selektor (Absatz)","en":"Selector (Paragraph)"}","formValues":{"module":"rz_textfield","selectorChooser":".text p","nthChildEnable":false,"type":"preset","presets":"first-of-type","customPseudoClass":"nth-of-type","customType":"single","singleStartIndex":"1","multipleCount":"1","allStartIndex":"1","multipleOffsetStartIndex":"1","multipleOffsetNth":"1","additionalSelector":".text p"},"expanded":true,"templateUnitId":"MUNIT-b7001349-0bb9-460c-a52e-438b6e96e114-MUNIT","id":"MUNIT-3758c36d-50d5-41b9-9227-fb1ce3e68316-MUNIT","children":[{"moduleId":"rz_style_padding_margin","name":"","formValues":{"cssEnableMargin":{"type":"bp","default":true},"cssMarginBottom":{"type":"bp","default":"16px"}},"expanded":true,"templateUnitId":"MUNIT-20a3947d-a5f2-4648-8984-00e3799dbfd8-MUNIT","id":"MUNIT-92961b04-3a79-473a-8910-54c51e7e236c-MUNIT"}]}]},{"moduleId":"rz_html","name":"","formValues":{"htmlCode":"<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" lang="en"><p>14 days free trial is history! Netscape created its own HTML tags without regard to the traditional standards process. For example, Netscape 1.1 included tags for changing background colours and formatting text with tables on web pages. Throughout 1996 to 1999 the </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Browser_wars" title="Browser wars" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Browser_wars" data-cms-link-type="external">browser wars</a><span> began, as </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft" title="Microsoft" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft" data-cms-link-type="external">Microsoft</a><span> and </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netscape" title="Netscape" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netscape" data-cms-link-type="external">Netscape</a><span>fought for ultimate browser dominance. During this time there were many new technologies in the field, notably </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cascading_Style_Sheets" title="Cascading Style Sheets" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cascading_Style_Sheets" data-cms-link-type="external">Cascading Style Sheets</a><span>, </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaScript" title="JavaScript" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaScript" data-cms-link-type="external">JavaScript</a><span>, and </span><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dynamic_HTML" title="Dynamic HTML" data-cms-link="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dynamic_HTML" data-cms-link-type="external">Dynamic HTML</a><span>. On the whole, the browser competition did lead to many positive creations and helped web design evolve at a rapid pace.</span></p>"},"expanded":true,"description":"","ghostContainer":false,"visibleFormGroups":["9b68effe-95e3-4c14-9582-82b370ee7f74"],"templateUnitId":"MUNIT-15d022ab-3554-4505-9303-a992030779d2-MUNIT","id":"MUNIT-5f7ecc2e-bb7e-4fe5-be08-e0589db03ff9-MUNIT","inserted":true,"insideGhost":false,"children":[{"moduleId":"rz_style_font","name":"","formValues":{"cssEnableLetterSpacing":{"type":"bp","default":false},"cssEnableLineHeight":{"type":"bp","default":true},"cssLineHeight":{"type":"bp","default":"175%"},"cssEnableFontSize":{"type":"bp","[object
